channel.title: Close!
channel.description: I've learned alot coding this server, but i have started a new project, making old school server.

item.title: Close!
item.dc:creator: @xShrawenx xShrawenx
item.description:
@xShrawenx wrote:

[quote=“Team_Rocket, post:5, topic:429120”]List of reasons why this is terrible:

  1. The first message I see in the chat box is “when donating make sure you donate to blahblahblah”. There’s two donation messages?
  2. Good job adding tutorials.
  3. No unique, original, or creative content at all.
  4. Adding bonuses to equipment is something you do when you’re just starting out.
  5. Good job spawning a few NPC’s.
  6. You didn’t “add” anything, you just followed tutorials.

I’m not even being mean, I’m telling you the truth.[/quote]

Good for telling this, but:
Yes, i have checked few tutorials, how otherwise could i start coding? -.-
Uhmm… i think ElegantPkz’s home is pretty unique and the monsters / bosses…
What should i ‘‘add’’ so it would count as coding in your opinion.

EDIT: Oh yeah, one more thing, yes, there is two messages having information of donations, one of them saying you can donate RSGP too, second one saying donate to Shrawen only = What’s ur problem?
I said i’m just a beginner, you have no reason to be such a douche.

Read full topic

item.title: Close!
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

List of reasons why this is terrible:

  1. The first message I see in the chat box is “when donating make sure you donate to blahblahblah”. There’s two donation messages?
  2. Good job adding tutorials.
  3. No unique, original, or creative content at all.
  4. Adding bonuses to equipment is something you do when you’re just starting out.
  5. Good job spawning a few NPC’s.
  6. You didn’t “add” anything, you just followed tutorials.

I’m not even being mean, I’m telling you the truth.
